H0.text: What element is the main constituent of anthracite. Oxygen

H1.text: What element is the main constituent of anthracite. Silicon

H2.text: What element is the main constituent of anthracite. Aluminum

H3.text: What element is the main constituent of anthracite. CARBON

A4.text: The carbon content of anthracite is between 86% and 97%.

A5.text: An example of a chemical formula for high-grade anthracite would be C240H90O4NS, representing 94% carbon.
